actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution providing a system of overtime pay in lieu of compensatory time off for officers and members of the U.S. Capitol Police under the House of Representatives, subject to rules and regulations prescribed by the Committee on House Administration.

summary.text: Provides a system of overtime pay in lieu of compensatory time off for officers and members of the United States Capitol Police under the House of Representatives, subject to rules and regulations prescribed by the Committee on House Administration.

titles.title: Resolution providing a system of overtime pay in lieu of compensatory time off for officers and members of the U.S. Capitol Police under the House of Representatives, subject to rules and regulations prescribed by the Committee on House Administration.
